org.kaaproject.kaa.client

Interface KaaClientStateListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleKaaClientStateListener

    public interface KaaClientStateListener
    Notifies about Kaa client state changes and errors
    Author:
    Andrew Shvayka

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPaused()
      On successful pause of Kaa client.
      void onPauseFailure(KaaException exception)
      On failure during Kaa client pause.
      void onResume()
      On successful resume of Kaa client.
      void onResumeFailure(KaaException exception)
      On failure during Kaa client resume.
      void onStarted()
      On successful start of Kaa client.
      void onStartFailure(KaaException exception)
      On failure during Kaa client startup.
      void onStopFailure(KaaException exception)
      On failure during Kaa client stop.
      void onStopped()
      On successful stop of Kaa client.

    • Method Detail

      • onStarted

        void onStarted()
        On successful start of Kaa client. Kaa client is successfully connected to Kaa cluster and is ready for usage.

      • onStartFailure

        void onStartFailure(KaaException exception)
        On failure during Kaa client startup. Typically failure is related to network issues.
        Parameters:
        exception - - cause of failure

      • onPaused

        void onPaused()
        On successful pause of Kaa client. Kaa client is successfully paused and does not consume any resources now.

      • onPauseFailure

        void onPauseFailure(KaaException exception)
        On failure during Kaa client pause. Typically related to failure to free some resources.
        Parameters:
        exception - - cause of failure

      • onResume

        void onResume()
        On successful resume of Kaa client. Kaa client is successfully connected to Kaa cluster and is ready for usage.

      • onResumeFailure

        void onResumeFailure(KaaException exception)
        On failure during Kaa client resume. Typically failure is related to network issues.
        Parameters:
        exception - - cause of failure

      • onStopped

        void onStopped()
        On successful stop of Kaa client. Kaa client is successfully stopped and does not consume any resources now.

      • onStopFailure

        void onStopFailure(KaaException exception)
        On failure during Kaa client stop. Typically related to failure to free some resources.
        Parameters:
        exception - - cause of failure
